metadata.synopsis: This occurs after the argument betwen Lia and Rolan. Lia is still stewing after the fight. Opportunity to get to know her better and understand the group dynamics.
metadata.how_to_trigger: from crashsitein reCon: teleport S_GLO_ProdigySisterclick on Lia, go through group dialogueclick on Lia after group dialogue (different paths if you convinced them to stay or go)

0.speaker: Lia
0.text: Those goblins will rue the day they chose to tangle with this grove.

2.speaker: Lia
2.text: You and I will do some good here - I can feel it.

3.speaker: Lia
3.text: I keep dreaming I'll wake up with my throat slit. May your sleep be more pleasant.
3.context: NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh and sadness.

4.speaker: Lia
4.text: I hate it, but Rolan is right. Every moment here is another we risk dying at the hands of greenskins.

1.speaker: Lia
1.text: You'd best get out too - while there's still time.
